In each step you may combine two numbers, never using a number twice but you must use all numbers.
Your allowed operations are +, -, and *.

Alternatively, subtract 1 from 3 to get 2, then subtract 2 from 7 to get 5, and subtract 5 from 9 to get 4. This is not helpful either. [OUTPUT] 9 - 7 = 2
